drawnet.lib.ddl.constraints
Class Constraint

java.lang.Object
  drawnet.lib.ddl.constraints.Constraint
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryConstraint, CheckConstraint, ExpConstraint, TrueConstraint, UnaryConstraint
public abstract class Constraint
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract superclass of all constraints. This is meant to be extended to create new constraint types.

This class manages a log of all ViolatedContraint objects. The log can be accessed by static methods, e.g.

Constraint.getViolatedConstraint(1);

See Also:
UnaryConstraint, BinaryConstraint, ViolatedConstraint
